alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Sanilac; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:28AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sanilac, southeastern Lapeer, northern Macomb and St. Clair Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 927 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oxford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Imlay City and Almont around 940 AM EDT. Capac around 945 AM EDT. Yale and Emmett around 955 AM EDT. Lakeport around 1010 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include North Street, Goodland Township, Lynn Township, Amador, Brockway, Fort Gratiot, Avoca, Fargo, Berville and Roseburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
